info.title: 8. EVENT服务
info.description:
本部分包含了通知系统的操作和模型。 调用url为客户提供附加信息，以更好地处理系统生成的事件。

客户端应通过Webhook服务注册事件回调，以接收任何事件。

400.description:
Possible error codes:

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| 999995 | \[PARAMETER\] ERROR_MESSAGE |

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Event topic defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: If nonzero, skip this number of results before returning data. Used with `pageSize` to provide pagination for large datasets.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: If nonzero, return no more than this number of results. Used with `pageNum` to provide pagination for large datasets. Unless otherwise specified, the maximum number of records that can be returned from an API call is 20 records

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Event status defined in Lianlian Pay's system. One of:

| status | description |
|--------|-------------|
| PROCESSING | Event is under processing |
| SUCCESS | Successfully notified client via webhook. Received `200` HTTP status code return from registered webhook URL. |
| MAXIMUM_RETRIES_REACHED | Callback stopped as maximum retry number reached without success. |

event.title: Event
event.description: 调用注册的Webhook url收到200 HTTP状态代码后，事件状态将更新为SUCCESS。 在成功之前，每60分钟将事件发送到注册的Webhook url，总共24次。 全部24次重试均未成功后，事件状态将更新为MAXIMUM_RETRIES_REACHED。

id.description: Event id in Lianlian Pay's system

status.description:
Event status defined in Lianlian Pay's system. One of:

| status | description |
|--------|-------------|
| PROCESSING | Event is under processing |
| SUCCESS | Successfully notified client via webhook. Received `200` HTTP status code return from registered webhook URL. |
| MAXIMUM_RETRIES_REACHED | Callback notification stopped as maximum retrying number reached. |

webhookURL.description: Registered webhook url for this event

event-topic-enum.title: Event-Topic枚举
event-topic-enum.description:
定义的Topic

| Topic | Event-Data名称| 描述|
|--------|------------|------------|
| withdraw.event.response | 提现Event|在提现成功、提现失败时触发相关事件|

status.description:
状态

key|name
-|-
2|提现成功
